metadata.title: Dar exchanges Eid greetings with Foreign Minister of Iran

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 07 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Friday held a telephone call with Foreign Minister of Iran, Seyed Abbas Araghchi and exchanged greetings on the blessed occasion of Eid-ul-Azha. During the conversation, they also prayed for peace and well being of the people of Palestine and the Ummah, a foreign office spokesperson said in a press statement.
